sn22.33:1.3: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.5: Rupam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
sn22.33:1.6: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.8: Sa vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:1.11: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn22.33:1.13: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam imasmim jetavane tinakatthasakhapalasam tam jano hareyya va daheyya va yathapaccayam va kareyya.
sn22.33:2.3: ‘amhe jano harati va dahati va yathapaccayam va karoti’”ti?
sn22.33:2.6: “Na hi no etam, bhante, atta va attaniyam va”ti.
sn22.33:2.7: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, rupam na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
sn22.33:2.8: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.10: Sa vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.33:2.14: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
